Articles.Content: I haven't seen any mention or summary. Did Squadcast happen last week or was it cancelled?

It started late, and consisted solely of Max playing KSP better than usual.

Happy landings!

> 
> It started late, and consisted solely of Max playing KSP better than usual.
> Happy landings!

Wait, he actually MADE it somewhere?
ROFL. So no info on the coming patch then? That's a shame. Glad to hear he is getting better though.

> 
> Wait, he actually MADE it somewhere?

Yes, but not back. The craft got flung out into interplanetary space inwards towards Eve orbit.

> 
> ROFL. So no info on the coming patch then? That's a shame. Glad to hear he is getting better though.

HarvesteR, Mu and Romfarer (Felipe, Mike and Jim) should all be back from holiday this week so hopefully we'll get some kind of progress indication in this weeks devnotes

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-15T02:08:40Z" title="06/15/2015 02:08  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 15, 2015</time> by NoMrBond**

There wasn't much for news; Firstly, he'll be on vacation for the next 2 weeks and Kasper will be taking over Squadcast in the meantime. Secondly, he's still under NDA for various business projects that he hinted at the previous week.

Was anyone so kind as to do a squad cast summary write up for the last one?

Many thanks,

Sam

Maxmaps ran into traffic and was late starting or early finishing the most recent - it was just half an hour. He has not had much to say in the last two SQ's. He is under a heavy NDA regarding something cool that he'd like to share, but until that lifts, he's been rather tight-lipped, to avoid leaking info inadvertently. NDA's protect all sides, in case the deal does not go through, for whatever reason.

 Per the Devnotes telling us three developers are out on vacation, there hasn't much more to talk about that isn't in the written in Devnote Tuesday postings. The 1.0.3 patch has been in testing, but we are waiting for developers to return (hopefully this week) and see what might need adjusting, based on the testing. Finally, Max announced he'd be going on his own vacation this week, no official SQ is expected - there's a small chance Kasper might host it.

Mods: I suggest a merge with [Squadcast last Friday? (6/12)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/125458-Squadcast-last-Friday-%286-12%29)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-15T16:29:30Z" title="06/15/2015 04:29  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 15, 2015</time> by basic.syntax**

> 
> Mods: I suggest a merge

Done.

My work is rather inconvenient right now and for the forseeable future, I won't be able to provide a Squadcast summary. Anyone who wants to is more than welcome to carry it on, but by the looks of things, there's not much going on anyway.

> 
> My work is rather inconvenient right now and for the forseeable future, I won't be able to provide a Squadcast summary. Anyone who wants to is more than welcome to carry it on, but by the looks of things, there's not much going on anyway.

by the looks of this thread we are lost without you haha. thanks again for your previous work though.

Yeah sorry about that.. turns out, accepting an assistant manager position with just 1 other person who's as good as you (actual manager) means working 55+ hour weeks, who knew? That and I'm lucky if I get home before 0045 Saturday (15 minutes after SQ starts) and have to get up again 6 hours later to do an 11 hour shift.. haven't really got enough time for.. well, anything. So yeah, if anyone wants to, I don't mind passing over the baton, at least for the forseeable future.
Best excuse ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) Good luck with the job, OWK!
Well, I can always go back and watch the replay of it, but I can't always be there live. I'd be happy to write a summary if OWK is no longer available.

> 
> I'd be happy to write a summary if OWK is no longer available.

Go for it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
